My Skills

So who am I?

My name is Alex Rus and I am a Back-end and Full-stack Software Engineer and Data Scientist. I am currently a senior at Worcester Polytechnic Insititute majoring in Computer Science with minors in Data Science and Business. I have always enjoyed problem solving and expanding my knowledge in the field of computer science. Over the years I have completed numerous projects using all types of technologies and frameworks, but I am always looking for more!
